metadata.name: Fall 2022: META-511 x otmr
metadata.description:
distorted public domain • digital manipulation • 567x567 • JPEG

distorted my first ever mint - "Fall 2022: META-511" (https://opensea.io/assets/ethereum/0x3ad059e4a22931e3658e69c44f36ed561dd5df17/10590)

This was my access token to META-511: NFTs and the Metaverse, a free MOOC by the University of Nicosia (UNIC) and the world's first university course delivered on-chain and in the metaverse.

Course Information: https://www.unic.ac.cy/openmetaverse/mooc-nfts-metaverse/

licensed under CC0 - https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0
